reviews.text: My wife and I are from Cleveland and make a trip one or two times a year. Good service and good food. We enjoy the old school decor. Only down side is how...
Was here a few months ago with a friend and decided I needed to come back because it was just so good. I highly recommend the pretzel bites with beer cheese!
Schmidt's is a Columbus icon and in my opinion somewhere every native or tourist alike should visit at least once. The interior isn't quite as big as other...
